1 CLNR_CHECK_1 - In the last working week, did you clean any of the following types of buildings?
CLNR_1C Schools or any public buildings (e.g. museums, theatres) (3)
CLNR_1G Industrial buildings or factory floors (7)
1B1 CLNR_RADIO_1B1 - In the last working week, did you clean rooms where radioisotopes or radiotherapy had been administered to patients?
If 1 = CLNR_1G Industrial buildings or factory floors
1G1 CLNR_CHECK_1G1 - Which areas did you clean in the last working week?
CLNR_1G1B Factory floor (including stairways, halls, corridors, bathrooms) (2)
If 1G1 = CLNR_1G1B Factory floor (including stairways, halls, corridors, bathrooms)
1G1B1 CLNR_RADIO_1G1B1 - What product was made at the industrial or factory site that you cleaned?
1H1 CLNR_RADIO_1H1 - What was the other type of building?
if jobcat7 = 9 or jobcat10 = 8 or jobcat11 = 14
1 CLNR_aFAB_RADIO_2_1 - In the last working week, did you clean fabrics such as carpets, clothes or textiles?
1A1 CLNR_aFAB_CHECK_2_1A1 - In the last working week, did you use any of the following chemicals to clean stains from fabrics?
aFAB_1A1B Solvent- based cleaners (e.g. Petroleum distillates / hydrocarbon dry cleaners) (2)
1A2 CLNR_aFAB_CHECK_2_1A2 - How was the area where you worked ventilated?
aFAB_1A2A By local exhaust ventilation which captured the vapour, dust, fume at the emission point (1)
aFAB_1A2B By on-tool extraction to remove dust and fumes away from your face (2)
aFAB_1A2C By a general ventilation system (3)
aFAB_1A2D By fans in the window or doorway (4)
aFAB_1A2E By open doors or windows (5)
aFAB_1A2F No ventilation was applied to the area (6)
if jobcat7 = 9 or jobcat10 = 8 or jobcat11 = 14
3 CLNR_RADIO_3 - In the last working week, did you or anyone near you clean up wood dust?
3A1 CLNR_CHECK_3A1 - How did you or anyone around you clean up the wood dust in the last working week?
CLNR_3A1B Using vacuum cleaner fitted with a HEPA filter (2)
CLNR_3A1D Using a brush or sweeping the area with a broom (4)
CLNR_3A1E Mopping the area with water (5)
CLNR_3A1G The working area was not cleaned of dust (7)
if jobcat7 = 9 or jobcat10 = 8 or jobcat11 = 14
1 CLNR_aFTC_RADIO_4_1 - In the last working week, did you manually clean inside fuel tanks?
1A1 CLNR_aFTC_CHECK_4_1A1 - What type of fuel was in the fuel tank that you cleaned?
1A2 CLNR_aFTC_CHECK_4_1A2 - Did you use any of the following products to clean inside the fuel tanks?
aFTC_1A2A Solvent-based cleaners (e.g Petroleum distillates/ hydrocarbon cleaners) (1)
1A3 CLNR_aFTC_RADIO_4_1A3 - In the last working week, where did you clean fuel tanks?
aFTC_1A3B I entered the tank to clean it (2)
1A3A1 CLNR_aFTC_CHECK_4_1A3A1 - How was the area ventilated?
aFTC_1A3A1A By local exhaust ventilation which captured the vapour, dust, fume at the emission point (1)
aFTC_1A3A1B By on-tool extraction to remove dust and fumes away from your face (2)
aFTC_1A3A1C By a general ventilation system (3)
aFTC_1A3A1D By fans in the window or doorway (4)
aFTC_1A3A1E By open doors or windows (5)
aFTC_1A3A1F No ventilation was applied to the area (6)
If 1A3 = CLNR_aFTC_1A3B I entered the tank to clean it
1A3B1 CLNR_aFTC_RADIO_4_1A3B1 - In the last working week, did you use an air-supplied respirator or SCBA (self-contained breathing apparatus) to enter the tank and clean it?
If 1A3 = CLNR_aFTC_1A3B I entered the tank to clean it
1A3B2 CLNR_aFTC_RADIO_4_1A3B2 - In the last working week, was the tank ventilated before you entered to clean it?
1A4 CLNR_aFTC_RADIO_4_1A4 - In the last working week, did you use respiratory protection?
1A4A1 CLNR_aFTC_CHECK_4_1A4A1 - What types of respiratory protective equipment (RPE) did you use?
aFTC_1A4A1A Rubber face mask fitted with a particle/vapour filter or a cartridge (1)
aFTC_1A4A1C Air-supplied respirator or SCBA (self-contained breathing apparatus) (3)
aFTC_1A4A1D A filtering face piece mask or dust mask (called an FFP) (4)

1 CLNR_aSER_RADIO_5_1 - In the last working week, did you access service tunnels to do activities of removal, assembling or maintenance?
1A1 CLNR_aSER_RADIO_5_1A1 - Were the tunnels in a building which was constructed before 2005? [IPSOS: DE, FI: 1993; FR: 1997; IE: 2000; ES: 2002 ; HU: 2005]
1A1A1 CLNR_aSER_RADIO_5_1A1A1 - In the last working week, did you see pipes with lagging or insulation around where you were working in the tunnels?
1A1A1A1 CLNR_aSER_RADIO_5_1A1A1A1 - Was the insulation crumbly or fibrous?
1A2 CLNR_aSER_CHECK_5_1A2 - How were the service tunnels ventilated?
aSER_1A2A By local exhaust ventilation which captured the vapour, dust, fume at the emission point (1)
aSER_1A2B By on-tool extraction to remove dust and fumes away from your face (2)
aSER_1A2C By a general ventilation system (3)
aSER_1A2D By fans in the window or doorway (4)
aSER_1A2E By open doors or windows (5)
aSER_1A2F No ventilation was applied to the area (6)

1 CLNR_aFPE_RADIO_6_1 - In the last working week, did you use or repair any fuel-powered equipment other than vehicles or generators (e.g., concrete cutter, metal cutter, truck mount, chainsaws, lawnmowers, concrete mixer, brush cutter)?

aFPE_1A1C Propane or Liquefied Petroleum Gas (LPG) (3)
1A2 CLNR_aFPE_RADIO_6_1A2 - Were you indoors when you were using or repairing the equipment?
1A2A1 CLNR_aFPE_CHECK_6_1A2A1 - How was the area where you worked ventilated?
aFPE_1A2A1A By local exhaust ventilation which captured the vapour, dust, fume at the emission point (1)
aFPE_1A2A1B By on-tool extraction to remove dust and fumes away from your face (2)
aFPE_1A2A1C By a general ventilation system (3)
aFPE_1A2A1D By fans in the window or doorway (4)
aFPE_1A2A1E By open doors or windows (5)
aFPE_1A2A1F No ventilation was applied to the area (6)

1 CLNR_aDVM_RADIO_7_1 - In the last working week, did you drive, maintain, or travel in vehicles as part of your work?
1A1 CLNR_aDVM_CHECK_7_1A1 - What types of fuel did the vehicles that you drove, maintained or travelled in use?
aDVM_1A1C Liquified Petroleum Gas (LPG) or propane (3)
1A2 CLNR_aDVM_RADIO_7_1A2 - In the last working week, did you fuel the vehicles yourself?
1A3 CLNR_aDVM_RADIO_7_1A3 - In the last working week, did you drive or travel in vehicles as part of your work?
1A3A1 CLNR_aDVM_CHECK_7_1A3A1 - What types of roads or areas did you drive or travel on?
aDVM_1A3A1A Any public street or road in an urban area (1)
aDVM_1A3A1B National, regional, district or municipal roads outside an urban area (including motorways) (2)
aDVM_1A3A1F Surface driving in an open mine or in a quarry (6)
1A4 CLNR_aDVM_RADIO_7_1A4 - In the last working week, did you perform any maintenance work on vehicles?
1A4A1 CLNR_aDVM_RADIO_7_1A4A1 - In the last working week, did you do tune ups, exhaust pipe work, or engine overhauls on the vehicles?
1A4A1A1 CLNR_aDVM_RADIO_7_1A4A1A1 - In the last working week, did you attach a hose to the exhaust pipe of the vehicle you maintained to lead the exhaust fumes outside?
1A4A2 CLNR_aDVM_RADIO_7_1A4A2 - In the last working week, did you service/repair/replace brakes or clutches?
1A4A2A1 CLNR_aDVM_RADIO_7_1A4A2A1 - In the last working week, did you service/repair/replace brakes or clutches on vehicles older than [DE: 2005, FI: 1993; FR: 1997; IE: 2000; ES: 2002 ; HU: 2005]?
1A4A4 CLNR_aDVM_RADIO_7_1A4A4 - In the last working week, did you drain fuel tanks or change fuel filters?
1A4A5 CLNR_aDVM_CHECK_7_1A4A5 - In the last working week, did you work indoors or outdoors?
1A4A5A1 CLNR_aDVM_CHECK_7_1A4A5A1 - How was the area where you carried out vehicle maintenance ventilated?
aDVM_1A4A5A1A By local exhaust ventilation which captured the vapour, dust, fume at the emission point (1)
aDVM_1A4A5A1B By on-tool extraction to remove dust and fumes away from your face (2)
aDVM_1A4A5A1C By a general ventilation system (3)
aDVM_1A4A5A1D By fans in the window or doorway (4)
aDVM_1A4A5A1E By open doors or windows (5)
aDVM_1A4A5A1F No ventilation was applied to the area (6)

1 CLNR_aUVR_RADIO_8_1 - In the last working week, did you work outside during the day (includes being in a vehicle that is outside)?
1A1 CLNR_aUVR_RADIO_8_1A1 - In the last working week, did you work with or near reflective surfaces, such as sand, glass, roofing iron, water?
1A1A1 CLNR_aUVR_CHECK_8_1A1A1 - In the last working week, did you work with or near any of the following reflective surfaces?
1A3 CLNR_aUVR_CHECK_8_1A3 - When you were working outdoors, were you:
aUVR_1A3A Under partial shade (e.g., sun shade sail, under trees) (1)

1A3A2 CLNR_aUVR_RADIO_8_1A3A2 - In the last working week, did you wear clothing that covered most of your body (i.e., trousers and shirts or t-shirts with sleeves) when working under partial shade?
If 1A3 = CLNR_aUVR_1A3A Under partial shade (e.g., sun shade sail, under trees)
1A3A3 CLNR_aUVR_RADIO_8_1A3A3 - In the last working week, did you wear sunscreen when working under partial shade?

1A3A4 CLNR_aUVR_RADIO_8_1A3A4 - In the last working week did you wear a hat or other sun protection head cover when working out under partial shade?
1A3B1 CLNR_aUVR_RADIO_8_1A3B1 - In the last working week, how many hours per day did you spend working out in the open?
1A3B2 CLNR_aUVR_RADIO_8_1A3B2 - In the last working week, did you wear clothing that covered most of your body (i.e., trousers and shirts or t-shirts with sleeves) when working out in the open?
1A3B3 CLNR_aUVR_RADIO_8_1A3B3 - In the last working week, did you wear sunscreen when working out in the open?
1A3B4 CLNR_aUVR_RADIO_8_1A3B4 - In the last working week, did you wear a hat or other sun protection head cover when working out in the open?
1A3C1 CLNR_aUVR_RADIO_8_1A3C1 - In the last working week, did you have your windows open in the vehicle you were working in?
